body_html:
@protoget thank you for the clarification. That is what I was wondering about. I couldn't really find the answer in the cuDNN docs and I figured since it's exposed via TF that TF docs should document the behavior, even if it's not necessarily modifiable.

I haven't submitted any PR requests for TF yet so I would have to sign the CLA, etc, which may take some time. I'm happy to do it but feel free to change the docs yourself as well.

Thanks again!
